message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and quality, I believe it's worth $80. Let me know if this works for you!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I'm looking to spend closer to $70. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering your feedback, I'm willing to negotiate. My counteroffer is $75 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations!
